Reference

All functions

OikScrambling-package

The OikScrambling package

addMetadataToGRanges()

Add metadata to a GenomicRanges object

compDistClass()

Transform pair name into distance class.

compDistance()

Transform pair name into distance name.

compGenus()

Transform pair name into genus name.

loadAllAnnotations()

Load all annotations

loadAllGenomes()

Load all genomes

loadAllRepeats()

Load all repeat annotations

loadAllTranscriptsGR()

Load all transcript information as GRanges

load_one_to_ones()

Load one-to-one orthogroups for a set of species

loaddNdSTable()

Load dNdS data from OikScrambling data
